title: I was double charged for the purchase of a champion with Riot Points. Which branch of support is bes
body:
I purchased the $10 of Riot Points package, then went and purchase Kled from the store. My purchase history shows two transactions for Kled and I have lost the RP as if I was charged twice.

I have checked the support website and it doesn't seem like there's even a default ticket option for this kind of issue. I haven't played this game since season 3, what is the best way to get in contact with Riot over something like this?

replies.body: We got you fam! If you hadn't noticed yet, it seems like one of our agents was already able to get that duplicate purchase refunded for you already ^_^! If you aren't seeing that RP back yet please be sure to refresh your client really quickly.

there should be a ticket for riot points in general or for purchases just wait for them to reply then explain what happened with the linked image
should give u the rp
